title: [K-12] Online Learning Environment Management and Relationship-Building Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphones as the primary learning tool, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: They can establish strategies to optimize the learning environment by collecting participants’ prior experiences, expectations, and demographic information.
They can apply teaching methods that strengthen social presence by building trust relationships with learners using online survey tools.
They can derive learner-tailored feedback and course improvement plans by analyzing collected survey data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
